list_definition.definition: a very hard, colourless precious stone

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Her brooch had three diamonds in it

list_definition.definition: a piece of diamond (often artificial) used as a tip on eg a record-player stylus.
a kind of four-sided figure or shape; ♢

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: There was a pattern of red and yellow diamonds on the floor.

list_definition.definition: one of the playing cards of the suit diamonds, which have red symbols of this shape on them.
